author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Thank you to sponsor Opera! Download for free at https://opr.as/Opera-browser-nostalgianerd ~ Remember the Dodleston Messages? Well, here's a whole new computer based mystery to get your teeth stuck into. In this episode I'm exploring the Stockport Incident. Where it was claimed that a haunted Amstrad computer was terrorising staff and causing disruption for months, before being unveiled to the public. This is an investigative deep dive, so hold onto your pants!

⌚Timings⌚
00:00-04:27 What Happened?
04:27-08:37 Starting the Investigation
08:37-09:54 Opera
09:54-20:03 Chasing Scraps
20:03-25:28 "Ken Hughes"
25:28-31:02 Alexandra Palace
31:02-33:10 Centre for Computing History
33:10-35:24 Back at the Office
35:24-38:15 THE Magazine?
38:15-42:30 A New Lead
42:30-50:32 Peter Brameld
50:32-51:53 Conclusion
51:53-52:31 Credits

🔗Video Links🔗
For a full list of resources visit https://www.nostalgianerd.com/resources-1988-mystery/

The Dodleston Messages: https://youtu.be/nEDgG5MKndo?si=ADLkB
title: This Computer Did Things No Computer Should Do
